Types

Matrix = object
  data: seq[float]
  m*, n*: int

Procs

proc matrix(m, n: int): Matrix {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
Construct an m-by-n matrix of zeros. 
proc matrix(m, n: int; s: float): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Construct an m-by-n constant matrix. 
proc matrix(data: seq[seq[float]]): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Construct a matrix from a 2-D array. 
proc matrix(data: seq[seq[float]]; m, n: int): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Construct a matrix quickly without checking arguments. 
proc matrix(data: seq[float]; m: int): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Construct a matrix from a one-dimensional packed array.

parameter data: one-dimensional array of float, packed by columns (ala Fortran). Array length must be a multiple of m.

proc randMatrix(m, n: int): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Generate matrix with random elements.

return: an m-by-n matrix with uniformly distributed random elements.

proc identity(m: int): Matrix {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Generate identity matrix.

return: An m-by-m matrix with ones on the diagonal and zeros elsewhere.

proc norm1(m: Matrix): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

One norm.

return: maximum column sum

proc normInf(m: Matrix): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Infinity norm.

return: maximum row sum

proc normF(m: Matrix): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Frobenius norm.

return: sqrt of sum of squares of all elements.

proc trace(m: Matrix): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Matrix trace.

return: the sum of the diagonal elements
